Detailed Description

Function Documentation

◆ dsa_convert_float32_from_iso()

int dsa_convert_float32_from_iso ( DSA_DEVICE *  dev,
float *  inc,
double  iso,
int  conv 
)

Convert a value from iso value to float 32 bits drive internal format.

Parameters
deva pointer to the drive structure
incthe location to return the converted value
isothe value in iso unit
convthe conversion function index
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

◆ dsa_convert_float32_to_iso()

int dsa_convert_float32_to_iso ( DSA_DEVICE *  dev,
double *  iso,
float  inc,
int  conv 
)

Convert a value from drive 32 bits float internal format to iso value.

Parameters
deva pointer to the drive structure
isothe address of the variable to write in the conversion result
incthe value in increment
convthe conversion function index
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

◆ dsa_download_data_s()

int dsa_download_data_s ( DSA_DEVICE_BASE *  grp,
const void *  data,
size_t  size,
int  timeout 
)

Download a data chunk.

Data must correspond to data type specified by dsa_start_download... function - synchronous. This function will download "size" bytes of "data" buffer. If size is 0 or data is NULL, no data are downloaded and download operation will be terminated. This will properly terminate the download data process.
IT IS NOT POSSIBLE TO START SEVERAL KIND OF DOWNLOAD TOGETHER AND IT IS NOT POSSIBLE TO START AN UPLOAD WITH A DOWNLOAD TOGETHER !!!

Parameters
grpthe device-group or single device pointer
datathe data buffer
sizethe size of the data buffer in byte
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT It is not recommended to use this value with this function
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

◆ dsa_download_file_s()

int dsa_download_file_s ( DSA_DEVICE *  dev,
const char *  src_file_name,
const char *  dest_file_name,
int  block_type,
dword  flag,
long  timeout,
DSA_PROGRESS  progress_fct,
void *  puser 
)

Download a file on the target (Command:SDSF).

Available on UltimET Advanced or MISCON ONLY.

Parameters
devthe UltimET Advanced master or the MISCON into which the file must be downloaded
src_file_namethe name of the source file
dest_file_namethe name of the file on the target. The file name cannot be more than 32 characters length.
block_typethe block type. Each file is associated to a type. The type tells the target how to handle the file.
  • DMD_FW_BLOCK_BOOT
  • DMD_FW_BLOCK_FIRMWARE
  • DMD_FW_BLOCK_UPDATE_PACKAGE
  • DMD_FW_BLOCK_C_PARAMETER
  • DMD_FW_BLOCK_X_PARAMETER
  • DMD_FW_BLOCK_LOOKUP
  • DMD_FW_BLOCK_SEQUENCE
  • DMD_FW_BLOCK_KE_PARAMETER
  • DMD_FW_BLOCK_MAPPING
  • DMD_FW_BLOCK_EXTENSION_1
  • DMD_FW_BLOCK_EXTENSION_2
  • DMD_FW_BLOCK_RESERVED
  • DMD_FW_BLOCK_EXTENSION_RESERVED
  • DMD_FW_BLOCK_SIGNATURE
  • DMD_FW_BLOCK_METADATA
  • DMD_FW_BLOCK_IMAGE
  • DMD_FW_BLOCK_EDI
  • DMD_FW_BLOCK_CSM
  • DMD_FW_BLOCK_EXTRA
  • DMD_FW_BLOCK_FLASH
  • DMD_FW_BLOCK_XML_PARAMETER
  • DMD_FW_BLOCK_ESM
flagnot used
progress_fctthe the user function which will be called informing the progress of the function
pusera user parameter return as is to progress_fct
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT It is not recommended to use this value with this function
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured or number of really uploaded data in byte
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

◆ dsa_execute_command_a()

int dsa_execute_command_a ( DSA_DEVICE_BASE *  grp,
int  cmd,
ebool  fast,
ebool  ereport,
DSA_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Send a specific drive command without parameters - asynchronous.

Parameters
grpa pointer to the group structure
cmdthe number of the command to execute
fasttrue if this is an emergency command
ereporttrue if the function cannot be executed when the drive is in error
handlerthe handler function called when the function is executed
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error

int  cmd,
int  typ1,
int  par1,
ebool  fast,
ebool  ereport,
DSA_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Send a specific drive command with one parameter in increment - asynchronous.

Parameters
grpa pointer to the group structure
cmdthe number of the command to execute
typ1the typ of the parameter
  • DMD_TYP_IMMEDIATE 32 bits integer immediate value
  • DMD_TYP_IMMEDIATE_INT32 32 bits integer immediate value
  • DMD_TYP_USER 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_INT32 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_INT32 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR 32 bits integer monitoring registers (M)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR_INT32 32 bits integer monitoring registers (M)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_INT32 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT_INT32 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_Y 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_Y_INT32 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_INT32 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING_INT32 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM 32 bits integer ESM parameter (W)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_INT32 32 bits integer ESM parameter (W)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON ESM 32 bits integer ESM monitoring (R)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON ESM_INT32 32 bits integer ESM monitoring (R)
par1the parameter (in increment)
fasttrue if this is an emergency command
ereporttrue if the function cannot be executed when the drive is in error
handlerthe handler function called when the function is executed
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured

DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered

int dsa_execute_command_d_s ( DSA_DEVICE_BASE *  grp,
int  cmd,
int  typ1,
int  par1,
ebool  fast,
ebool  ereport,
long  timeout 
)

Send a specific drive command with one parameter in increment - synchronous.

Parameters
grpa pointer to the group structure
cmdthe number of the command to execute
typ1the typ of the parameter
  • DMD_TYP_IMMEDIATE 32 bits integer immediate value
  • DMD_TYP_IMMEDIATE_INT32 32 bits integer immediate value
  • DMD_TYP_USER 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_INT32 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_INT32 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR 32 bits integer monitoring registers (M)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR_INT32 32 bits integer monitoring registers (M)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_INT32 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT_INT32 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_Y 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_Y_INT32 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_INT32 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING_INT32 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM 32 bits integer ESM parameter (W)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_INT32 32 bits integer ESM parameter (W)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON ESM 32 bits integer ESM monitoring (R)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON ESM_INT32 32 bits integer ESM monitoring (R)
par1the parameter in increment
fasttrue if this is an emergency command
ereporttrue if the function cannot be executed when the drive is in error
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT It is not recommended to use this value with this function
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered

DSA_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Send a specific drive command with two parameter in integer 32 bits increment - asynchronous.

Parameters
grpa pointer to the group structure
cmdthe number of the command to execute
typ1the typ of the first parameter
  • DMD_TYP_IMMEDIATE 32 bits integer immediate value
  • DMD_TYP_IMMEDIATE_INT32 32 bits integer immediate value
  • DMD_TYP_USER 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_INT32 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_INT32 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR 32 bits integer monitoring registers (M)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR_INT32 32 bits integer monitoring registers (M)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_INT32 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT_INT32 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_Y 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_Y_INT32 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_INT32 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING_INT32 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM 32 bits integer ESM parameter (W)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_INT32 32 bits integer ESM parameter (W)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON ESM 32 bits integer ESM monitoring (R)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON ESM_INT32 32 bits integer ESM monitoring (R)
par1the first parameter (in increment)
typ2the typ of the second parameter
  • DMD_TYP_IMMEDIATE 32 bits integer immediate value
  • DMD_TYP_IMMEDIATE_INT32 32 bits integer immediate value
  • DMD_TYP_USER 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_INT32 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_INT32 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR 32 bits integer monitoring registers (M)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR_INT32 32 bits integer monitoring registers (M)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_INT32 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT_INT32 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_Y 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_Y_INT32 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_INT32 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING_INT32 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM 32 bits integer ESM parameter (W)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_INT32 32 bits integer ESM parameter (W)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON ESM 32 bits integer ESM monitoring (R)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON ESM_INT32 32 bits integer ESM monitoring (R)
par2the second parameter (in increment)
fasttrue if this is an emergency command
ereporttrue if the function cannot be executed when the drive is in error
handlerthe handler function called when the function is executed
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured

◆ dsa_execute_command_di_a()

int dsa_execute_command_di_a ( DSA_DEVICE_BASE *  grp,
int  cmd,
int  typ1,
int  par1,
int  typ2,
double  par2,
int  conv2,
ebool  fast,
ebool  ereport,
DSA_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Send a specific drive command with one parameter in integer 32 bits increment and one iso parameter - asynchronous.

Parameters
grpa pointer to the group structure
cmdthe number of the command to execute
typ1the typ of the first parameter
  • DMD_TYP_IMMEDIATE 32 bits integer immediate value
  • DMD_TYP_IMMEDIATE_INT32 32 bits integer immediate value
  • DMD_TYP_USER 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_INT32 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_INT32 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR 32 bits integer monitoring registers (M)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR_INT32 32 bits integer monitoring registers (M)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_INT32 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT_INT32 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_Y 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_Y_INT32 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_INT32 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING_INT32 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM 32 bits integer ESM parameter (W)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_INT32 32 bits integer ESM parameter (W)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON ESM 32 bits integer ESM monitoring (R)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON ESM_INT32 32 bits integer ESM monitoring (R)
par1the first parameter (in increment)
typ2the increment typ into which the ISO value will be converted
  • DMD_TYP_IMMEDIATE 32 bits integer immediate value
  • DMD_TYP_IMMEDIATE_INT32 32 bits integer immediate value
  • DMD_TYP_IMMEDIATE_INT64 64 bits integer immediate value
  • DMD_TYP_IMMEDIATE_FLOAT32 32 bits float immediate value
  • DMD_TYP_IMMEDIATE_FLOAT64 64 bits float immediate value
par2the second parameter (in iso)
conv2the conversion function index for the second parameter
  • The conversion function number or
  • DSA_CONV_AUTO will use conversion function associated to the command parameter
  • DSA_PPK_CONV(<register index>, <register subindex>) will use conversion function associated to the specified K register
  • DSA_MON_CONV(<register index>, <register subindex>) will use conversion function associated to the specified M register
  • DSA_REG_CONV(<register typ>, <register index>, <register subindex>) will use conversion function associated to the specified register
fasttrue if this is an emergency command
ereporttrue if the function cannot be executed when the drive is in error
handlerthe handler function called when the function is executed
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

◆ dsa_execute_command_di_s()

int dsa_execute_command_di_s ( DSA_DEVICE_BASE *  grp,
int  cmd,
int  typ1,
int  par1,
int  typ2,
double  par2,
int  conv2,
ebool  fast,
ebool  ereport,
long  timeout 
)

Send a specific drive command with one parameter in integer 32 bits increment and one iso parameter - synchronous.

Parameters
grpa pointer to the group structure
cmdthe number of the command to execute
typ1the typ of the first parameter
  • DMD_TYP_IMMEDIATE 32 bits integer immediate value
  • DMD_TYP_IMMEDIATE_INT32 32 bits integer immediate value
  • DMD_TYP_USER 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_INT32 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_INT32 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR 32 bits integer monitoring registers (M)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR_INT32 32 bits integer monitoring registers (M)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_INT32 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT_INT32 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_Y 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_Y_INT32 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_INT32 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING_INT32 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM 32 bits integer ESM parameter (W)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_INT32 32 bits integer ESM parameter (W)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON ESM 32 bits integer ESM monitoring (R)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON ESM_INT32 32 bits integer ESM monitoring (R)
par1the first parameter (in increment)
typ2the increment typ into which the ISO value will be converted
  • DMD_TYP_IMMEDIATE 32 bits integer immediate value
  • DMD_TYP_IMMEDIATE_INT32 32 bits integer immediate value
  • DMD_TYP_IMMEDIATE_INT64 64 bits integer immediate value
  • DMD_TYP_IMMEDIATE_FLOAT32 32 bits float immediate value
  • DMD_TYP_IMMEDIATE_FLOAT64 64 bits float immediate value
par2the second parameter (in iso)
conv2the conversion function index for the second parameter
  • The conversion function number or
  • DSA_CONV_AUTO will use conversion function associated to the command parameter
  • DSA_PPK_CONV(<register index>, <register subindex>) will use conversion function associated to the specified K register
  • DSA_MON_CONV(<register index>, <register subindex>) will use conversion function associated to the specified M register
  • DSA_REG_CONV(<register typ>, <register index>, <register subindex>) will use conversion function associated to the specified register
fasttrue if this is an emergency command
ereporttrue if the function cannot be executed when the drive is in error
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT It is not recommended to use this value with this function
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

int dsa_execute_command_id_a ( DSA_DEVICE_BASE *  grp,
int  cmd,
int  typ1,
double  par1,
int  conv1,
int  typ2,
int  par2,
ebool  fast,
ebool  ereport,
DSA_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Send a specific drive command with one iso and one parameter in integer 32 bits increment - asynchronous.

Parameters
grpa pointer to the group structure
cmdthe number of the command to execute
typ1the increment typ into which the ISO value will be converted
  • DMD_TYP_IMMEDIATE 32 bits integer immediate value
  • DMD_TYP_IMMEDIATE_INT32 32 bits integer immediate value
  • DMD_TYP_IMMEDIATE_INT64 64 bits integer immediate value
  • DMD_TYP_IMMEDIATE_FLOAT32 32 bits float immediate value
  • DMD_TYP_IMMEDIATE_FLOAT64 64 bits float immediate value
par1the first parameter (in iso)
conv1the conversion function index for the first parameter
  • The conversion function number or
  • DSA_CONV_AUTO will use conversion function associated to the command parameter
  • DSA_PPK_CONV(<register index>, <register subindex>) will use conversion function associated to the specified K register
  • DSA_MON_CONV(<register index>, <register subindex>) will use conversion function associated to the specified M register
  • DSA_REG_CONV(<register typ>, <register index>, <register subindex>) will use conversion function associated to the specified register
typ2the typ of the second parameter
  • DMD_TYP_IMMEDIATE 32 bits integer immediate value
  • DMD_TYP_IMMEDIATE_INT32 32 bits integer immediate value
  • DMD_TYP_USER 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_INT32 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_INT32 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR 32 bits integer monitoring registers (M)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR_INT32 32 bits integer monitoring registers (M)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_INT32 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT_INT32 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_Y 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_Y_INT32 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_INT32 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING_INT32 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM 32 bits integer ESM parameter (W)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_INT32 32 bits integer ESM parameter (W)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON ESM 32 bits integer ESM monitoring (R)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON ESM_INT32 32 bits integer ESM monitoring (R)
par2the second parameter (in increment)
fasttrue if this is an emergency command
ereporttrue if the function cannot be executed when the drive is in error
handlerthe handler function called when the function is executed
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured

DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered

  • DSA_MON_CONV(<register index>, <register subindex>) will use conversion function associated to the specified M register
  • DSA_REG_CONV(<register typ>, <register index>, <register subindex>) will use conversion function associated to the specified register
typ2the typ of the second parameter.
  • DMD_TYP_IMMEDIATE 32 bits integer immediate value
  • DMD_TYP_IMMEDIATE_INT32 32 bits integer immediate value
  • DMD_TYP_USER 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_INT32 32 bits integer user registers (X)

  • DMD_TYP_PPK_INT32 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)

  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_INT32 32 bits integer common register (C)

  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING_INT32 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)

  • DMD_TYP_ESM_INT32 32 bits integer ESM parameter (W)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON ESM 32 bits integer ESM monitoring (R)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON ESM_INT32 32 bits integer ESM monitoring (R)
par2the second parameter (in increment)
fasttrue if this is an emergency command
ereporttrue if the function cannot be executed when the drive is in error
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT It is not recommended to use this value with this function
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured

DSA_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Send a specific drive command with two iso parameter - asynchronous.

Parameters
grpa pointer to the group structure
cmdthe number of the command to execute
typ1the increment typ into which the ISO value will be converted
  • DMD_TYP_IMMEDIATE 32 bits integer immediate value
  • DMD_TYP_IMMEDIATE_INT32 32 bits integer immediate value
  • DMD_TYP_IMMEDIATE_INT64 64 bits integer immediate value
  • DMD_TYP_IMMEDIATE_FLOAT32 32 bits float immediate value
  • DMD_TYP_IMMEDIATE_FLOAT64 64 bits float immediate value
par1the first parameter (in iso)
conv1the conversion function index for the second parameter
  • The conversion function number or
  • DSA_CONV_AUTO will use conversion function associated to the command parameter
  • DSA_PPK_CONV(<register index>, <register subindex>) will use conversion function associated to the specified K register
  • DSA_MON_CONV(<register index>, <register subindex>) will use conversion function associated to the specified M register
  • DSA_REG_CONV(<register typ>, <register index>, <register subindex>) will use conversion function associated to the specified register
typ2the increment typ into which the ISO value will be converted
  • DMD_TYP_IMMEDIATE 32 bits integer immediate value
  • DMD_TYP_IMMEDIATE_INT32 32 bits integer immediate value
  • DMD_TYP_IMMEDIATE_INT64 64 bits integer immediate value
  • DMD_TYP_IMMEDIATE_FLOAT32 32 bits float immediate value
  • DMD_TYP_IMMEDIATE_FLOAT64 64 bits float immediate value
par2the second parameter (in iso)
conv2the conversion function index for the second parameter
  • The conversion function number or
  • DSA_CONV_AUTO will use conversion function associated to the command parameter
  • DSA_PPK_CONV(<register index>, <register subindex>) will use conversion function associated to the specified K register
  • DSA_MON_CONV(<register index>, <register subindex>) will use conversion function associated to the specified M register
  • DSA_REG_CONV(<register typ>, <register index>, <register subindex>) will use conversion function associated to the specified register
fasttrue if this is an emergency command
ereporttrue if the function cannot be executed when the drive is in error
handlerthe handler function called when the function is executed
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

◆ dsa_execute_command_ii_s()

int dsa_execute_command_ii_s ( DSA_DEVICE_BASE *  grp,
int  cmd,
int  typ1,
double  par1,
int  conv1,
int  typ2,
double  par2,
int  conv2,
ebool  fast,
ebool  ereport,
long  timeout 
)

Send a specific drive command with two iso parameter - synchronous.

Parameters
grpa pointer to the group structure
cmdthe number of the command to execute
typ1the increment typ into which the ISO value will be converted
  • DMD_TYP_IMMEDIATE 32 bits integer immediate value
  • DMD_TYP_IMMEDIATE_INT32 32 bits integer immediate value
  • DMD_TYP_IMMEDIATE_INT64 64 bits integer immediate value
  • DMD_TYP_IMMEDIATE_FLOAT32 32 bits float immediate value
  • DMD_TYP_IMMEDIATE_FLOAT64 64 bits float immediate value
par1the first parameter (in iso)
conv1the conversion function index for the second parameter
  • The conversion function number or
  • DSA_CONV_AUTO will use conversion function associated to the command parameter
  • DSA_PPK_CONV(<register index>, <register subindex>) will use conversion function associated to the specified K register
  • DSA_MON_CONV(<register index>, <register subindex>) will use conversion function associated to the specified M register
  • DSA_REG_CONV(<register typ>, <register index>, <register subindex>) will use conversion function associated to the specified register
typ2the increment typ into which the ISO value will be converted
  • DMD_TYP_IMMEDIATE 32 bits integer immediate value
  • DMD_TYP_IMMEDIATE_INT32 32 bits integer immediate value
  • DMD_TYP_IMMEDIATE_INT64 64 bits integer immediate value
  • DMD_TYP_IMMEDIATE_FLOAT32 32 bits float immediate value
  • DMD_TYP_IMMEDIATE_FLOAT64 64 bits float immediate value
par2the second parameter (in iso)
conv2the conversion function index for the second parameter
  • The conversion function number or
  • DSA_CONV_AUTO will use conversion function associated to the command parameter
  • DSA_PPK_CONV(<register index>, <register subindex>) will use conversion function associated to the specified K register
  • DSA_MON_CONV(<register index>, <register subindex>) will use conversion function associated to the specified M register
  • DSA_REG_CONV(<register typ>, <register index>, <register subindex>) will use conversion function associated to the specified register
fasttrue if this is an emergency command
ereporttrue if the function cannot be executed when the drive is in error
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT It is not recommended to use this value with this function
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

◆ dsa_execute_command_s()

int dsa_execute_command_s ( DSA_DEVICE_BASE *  grp,
int  cmd,
ebool  fast,
ebool  ereport,
long  timeout 
)

Send a specific drive command without parameters - synchronous.

Parameters
grpa pointer to the group structure
cmdthe number of the command to execute
fasttrue if this is an emergency command
ereporttrue if the function cannot be executed when the drive is in error
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT It is not recommended to use this value with this function
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered

◆ dsa_execute_command_sx_rx_s()

int dsa_execute_command_sx_rx_s ( DSA_MASTER_BASE *  grp,
int  cmd,
DSA_COMMAND_PARAM *  send_params,
int  send_count,
DSA_COMMAND_PARAM *  recv_params,
int  recv_count,
ebool  fast,
ebool  ereport,
long  timeout 
)

Send a specific drive command with any number of parameters to send and any number of parameter to receive - synchronous.

UltimET accepts some command which are able to return values.

Parameters
grpa pointer to the group structure
cmdthe number of the command to execute
send_paramsa pointer to the parameter array to send
send_countnumber of parameters in the sent parameter array
recv_paramsa pointer to the parameter array which will be returned
recv_countnumber of parameters in the receive parameter array
fasttrue if this is an emergency command
ereporttrue if the function cannot be executed when the drive is in error
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT It is not recommended to use this value with this function
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occurred
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool

DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group

DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state

◆ dsa_get_array_a()

int dsa_get_array_a ( DSA_DEVICE *  dev,
int  typ,
unsigned  idx,
unsigned  nidx,
int  sidx,
int *  val,
int  offset,
int  kind,
DSA_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Get an array of the drive register values - asynchronous.

Deprecated:
since EDI-4.24A. Use dsa_get_array_int32_a instead.
Parameters
deva pointer to the group structure
typthe type of register
  • DMD_TYP_USER 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_INT32 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_INT32 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR 32 bits integer monitoring registers (M)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR_INT32 32 bits integer monitoring registers (M)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_INT32 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT_INT32 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_Y 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_Y_INT32 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_INT32 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING_INT32 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM 32 bits integer ESM parameter (W)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_INT32 32 bits integer ESM parameter (W)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON ESM 32 bits integer ESM monitoring (R)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON ESM_INT32 32 bits integer ESM monitoring (R)
idxthe index number of the register
nidxthe size of the array
sidxthe depth of the register
vala pointer to receive the array read from the register array
offsetthe difference in bytes between two consecutive array elements
kindthe kind of value to read
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value
handlerthe handler function called when the function is executed
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

◆ dsa_get_array_float32_a()

int dsa_get_array_float32_a ( DSA_DEVICE *  dev,
int  typ,
unsigned  idx,
unsigned  nidx,
int  sidx,
float *  val,
int  offset,
int  kind,
DSA_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Get an array of drive register float 32 bits values - asynchronous.

Parameters
deva pointer to the group structure
typthe type of register
  • DMD_TYP_USER_FLOAT32 32 bits float user registers (XF)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_FLOAT32 32 bits float drive parameters (KF)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR_FLOAT32 32 bits float monitoring registers (MF)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_FLOAT32 32 bits float trace buffer (TF)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_FLOAT32 32 bits float common register (CF)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_FLOAT32 32 bits float ESM parameter (WF)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON_FLOAT32 32 bits float ESM monitoring (RF)
idxthe index number of the register
nidxthe size of the array
sidxthe depth of the register
vala pointer to receive the array read from the register array
offsetthe difference in bytes between two consecutive array elements
kindthe kind of value to read
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value
handlerthe handler function called when the function is executed
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found

DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled

DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

◆ dsa_get_array_float32_s()

int dsa_get_array_float32_s ( DSA_DEVICE *  dev,
int  typ,
unsigned  idx,
unsigned  nidx,
int  sidx,
float *  val,
int  offset,
int  kind,
long  timeout 
)

Get the an array of drive register 32 bits float values - synchronous.

Parameters
deva pointer to the group structure
typthe type of register
  • DMD_TYP_USER_FLOAT32 32 bits float user registers (XF)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_FLOAT32 32 bits float drive parameters (KF)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR_FLOAT32 32 bits float monitoring registers (MF)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_FLOAT32 32 bits float trace buffer (TF)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_FLOAT32 32 bits float common register (CF)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_FLOAT32 32 bits float ESM parameter (WF)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON_FLOAT32 32 bits float ESM monitoring (RF)
idxthe index number of the register
nidxthe size of the array
sidxthe depth of the register
vala pointer to receive the array read from the register array
offsetthe difference in bytes between two consecutive array elements
kindthe kind of value to read
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

int  typ,
unsigned  idx,
unsigned  nidx,
int  sidx,
double *  val,
int  offset,
int  kind,
DSA_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Get an array of drive register float 64 bits values - asynchronous.

Parameters
deva pointer to the group structure.
typthe type of register
  • DMD_TYP_USER_FLOAT64 64 bits float user registers (XD)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_FLOAT64 64 bits float drive parameters (KD)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR_FLOAT64 64 bits float monitoring registers (MD)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_FLOAT64 64 bits float trace buffer (TD)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_FLOAT64 64 bits float common register (CD)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_FLOAT64 64 bits float ESM parameter (WD)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON_FLOAT64 64 bits float ESM monitoring (RD)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT_FLOAT64 64 bits float movement lookup tables (LD)
idxthe index number of the register
nidxthe size of the array
sidxthe depth of the register
vala pointer to receive the array read from the register array
offsetthe difference in bytes between two consecutive array elements
kindthe kind of value to read
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value
handlerthe handler function called when the function is executed
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered

DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed

DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available

int dsa_get_array_int32_a ( DSA_DEVICE *  dev,
int  typ,
unsigned  idx,
unsigned  nidx,
int  sidx,
int *  val,
int  offset,
int  kind,
DSA_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Get an array of drive register integer 32 bits values - asynchronous.

Parameters
deva pointer to the group structure
typthe type of register
  • DMD_TYP_USER 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_INT32 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_INT32 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR 32 bits integer monitoring registers (M)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR_INT32 32 bits integer monitoring registers (M)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_INT32 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT_INT32 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_Y 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_Y_INT32 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_INT32 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING_INT32 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM 32 bits integer ESM parameter (W)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_INT32 32 bits integer ESM parameter (W)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON ESM 32 bits integer ESM monitoring (R)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON ESM_INT32 32 bits integer ESM monitoring (R)
idxthe index number of the register
nidxthe size of the array
sidxthe depth of the register
vala pointer to receive the array read from the register array
offsetthe difference in bytes between two consecutive array elements
kindthe kind of value to read
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value
handlerthe handler function called when the function is executed
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured

DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered

DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

◆ dsa_get_array_s()

int dsa_get_array_s ( DSA_DEVICE *  dev,
int  typ,
unsigned  idx,
unsigned  nidx,
int  sidx,
int *  val,
int  offset,
int  kind,
long  timeout 
)

Get an array of drive register 32 bits integer values - synchronous.

Deprecated:
since EDI-4.24A. Use dsa_get_array_int32_s instead.
Parameters
deva pointer to the group structure
typthe type of register
  • DMD_TYP_USER 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_INT32 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_INT32 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR 32 bits integer monitoring registers (M)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR_INT32 32 bits integer monitoring registers (M)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_INT32 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT_INT32 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_Y 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_Y_INT32 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_INT32 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING_INT32 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM 32 bits integer ESM parameter (W)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_INT32 32 bits integer ESM parameter (W)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON ESM 32 bits integer ESM monitoring (R)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON ESM_INT32 32 bits integer ESM monitoring (R)
idxthe index number of the register
nidxthe size of the array
sidxthe depth of the register
vala pointer to receive the array read from the register array
offsetthe difference in bytes between two consecutive array elements
kindthe kind of value to read
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

◆ dsa_get_inc_to_iso_factor()

int dsa_get_inc_to_iso_factor ( DSA_DEVICE *  dev,
int  conv,
double *  factor 
)

Return the conversion factor which must be applied to an increment value to get a ISO value.

This function returns DSA_ECONVERT if the conversion function is not linear and thus cannot be explained by a single factor

Parameters
deva pointer to the drive structure
convthe conversion function index
factora pointer to the received conversion factor
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device

DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error

DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available

DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error

◆ dsa_get_iso_array_a()

int dsa_get_iso_array_a ( DSA_DEVICE *  dev,
int  typ,
unsigned  idx,
unsigned  nidx,
int  sidx,
double *  val,
int  offset,
int  conv,
int  kind,
DSA_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Get the drive register values in iso unit if possible - asynchronous.

Parameters
deva pointer to the group structure
typthe type of register
  • DMD_TYP_USER 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_INT32 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_INT64 64 bits integer user registers (XL)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_FLOAT32 32 bits float user registers (XF)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_FLOAT64 64 bits float user registers (XD)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_INT32 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_INT64 64 bits integer drive parameters (KL)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_FLOAT32 32 bits float drive parameters (KF)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_FLOAT64 64 bits float drive parameters (KD)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR 32 bits integer monitoring registers (M)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR_INT32 32 bits integer monitoring registers (M)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR_INT64 64 bits integer monitoring registers (ML)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR_FLOAT32 32 bits float monitoring registers (MF)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR_FLOAT64 64 bits float monitoring registers (MD)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_INT32 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_INT64 64 bits integer trace buffer (TL)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_FLOAT32 32 bits float trace buffer (TF)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_FLOAT64 64 bits float trace buffer (TD)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT_INT32 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT_FLOAT64 64 bits float movement lookup tables (LD)
  • DMD_TYP_TRIGGER_INT64 64 bits integer triggers buffer (EL)
  • DMD_TYP_Y 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_Y_INT32 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_INT32 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_INT64 64 bits integer common register (CL)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_FLOAT32 32 bits float common register (CF)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_FLOAT64 64 bits float common register (CD)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING_INT32 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
idxthe index number of the register
nidxthe size of the array
sidxthe depth of the register
vala pointer to receive the array read from the register array
offsetthe difference in bytes between two consecutive array elements
convthe conversion function index for the array
  • The conversion function number or
  • DSA_CONV_AUTO will use conversion function associated to the register passsed as parameter
  • DSA_PPK_CONV(<register index>, <register subindex>) will use conversion function associated to the specified K register
  • DSA_MON_CONV(<register index>, <register subindex>) will use conversion function associated to the specified M register
  • DSA_REG_CONV(<register typ>, <register index>, <register subindex>) will use conversion function associated to the specified register
kindthe kind of value to read
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value
handlerthe handler function called when the function is executed
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

  • DSA_MON_CONV(<register index>, <register subindex>) will use conversion function associated to the specified M register

  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value

)

Get the drive register value in iso unit if possible - asynchronous.

Parameters
deva pointer to the group structure
typthe type of register
  • DMD_TYP_USER 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_INT32 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_INT64 64 bits integer user registers (XL)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_FLOAT32 32 bits float user registers (XF)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_FLOAT64 64 bits float user registers (XD)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_INT32 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_INT64 64 bits integer drive parameters (KL)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_FLOAT32 32 bits float drive parameters (KF)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_FLOAT64 64 bits float drive parameters (KD)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR 32 bits integer monitoring registers (M)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR_INT32 32 bits integer monitoring registers (M)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR_INT64 64 bits integer monitoring registers (ML)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR_FLOAT32 32 bits float monitoring registers (MF)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR_FLOAT64 64 bits float monitoring registers (MD)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_INT32 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_INT64 64 bits integer trace buffer (TL)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_FLOAT32 32 bits float trace buffer (TF)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_FLOAT64 64 bits float trace buffer (TD)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT_INT32 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT_FLOAT64 64 bits float movement lookup tables (LD)
  • DMD_TYP_TRIGGER_INT64 64 bits integer triggers buffer (EL)

  • DMD_TYP_Y_INT32 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)

  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_INT32 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_INT64 64 bits integer common register (CL)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_FLOAT32 32 bits float common register (CF)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_FLOAT64 64 bits float common register (CD)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING_INT32 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
idxthe index number of the register
sidxthe depth of the register
convthe conversion function index for the register
  • The conversion function number or
  • DSA_CONV_AUTO will use conversion function associated to the register passsed as parameter
  • DSA_PPK_CONV(<register index>, <register subindex>) will use conversion function associated to the specified K register
  • DSA_MON_CONV(<register index>, <register subindex>) will use conversion function associated to the specified M register
  • DSA_REG_CONV(<register typ>, <register index>, <register subindex>) will use conversion function associated to the specified register

  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value

a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
