◆ dsa_get_iso_register_s()

int dsa_get_iso_register_s ( DSA_DEVICE *  dev,
int  typ,
unsigned  idx,
int  sidx,
double *  val,
int  conv,
int  kind,
long  timeout 
)

Get the drive register value in iso unit if possible - synchronous.

Parameters
deva pointer to the group structure
typthe type of register
  • DMD_TYP_USER 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_INT32 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_INT64 64 bits integer user registers (XL)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_FLOAT32 32 bits float user registers (XF)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_FLOAT64 64 bits float user registers (XD)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_INT32 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_INT64 64 bits integer drive parameters (KL)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_FLOAT32 32 bits float drive parameters (KF)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_FLOAT64 64 bits float drive parameters (KD)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR 32 bits integer monitoring registers (M)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR_INT32 32 bits integer monitoring registers (M)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR_INT64 64 bits integer monitoring registers (ML)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR_FLOAT32 32 bits float monitoring registers (MF)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR_FLOAT64 64 bits float monitoring registers (MD)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_INT32 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_INT64 64 bits integer trace buffer (TL)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_FLOAT32 32 bits float trace buffer (TF)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_FLOAT64 64 bits float trace buffer (TD)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT_INT32 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT_FLOAT64 64 bits float movement lookup tables (LD)
  • DMD_TYP_TRIGGER_INT64 64 bits integer triggers buffer (EL)
  • DMD_TYP_Y 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_Y_INT32 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_INT32 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_INT64 64 bits integer common register (CL)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_FLOAT32 32 bits float common register (CF)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_FLOAT64 64 bits float common register (CD)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING_INT32 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
idxthe index number of the register
sidxthe depth of the register
valthe location to return read value
convthe conversion function index for the register
  • The conversion function number or
  • DSA_CONV_AUTO will use conversion function associated to the register passsed as parameter
  • DSA_PPK_CONV(<register index>, <register subindex>) will use conversion function associated to the specified K register
  • DSA_MON_CONV(<register index>, <register subindex>) will use conversion function associated to the specified M register
  • DSA_REG_CONV(<register typ>, <register index>, <register subindex>) will use conversion function associated to the specified register
kindthe kind of value to read
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

◆ dsa_get_register_a()

int dsa_get_register_a ( DSA_DEVICE *  dev,
int  typ,
unsigned  idx,
int  sidx,
int  kind,
DSA_INT_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Get the drive register 32 bits integer value - asynchronous.

Parameters
deva pointer to the group structure
typthe type of register
  • DMD_TYP_USER 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_INT32 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_INT32 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR 32 bits integer monitoring registers (M)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR_INT32 32 bits integer monitoring registers (M)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_INT32 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT_INT32 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_Y 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_Y_INT32 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_INT32 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING_INT32 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM 32 bits integer ESM parameter (W)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_INT32 32 bits integer ESM parameter (W)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON ESM 32 bits integer ESM monitoring (R)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON ESM_INT32 32 bits integer ESM monitoring (R)
idxthe index number of the register
sidxthe depth of the register
kindthe kind of value to read
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value
handlerthe handler function called when the function is executed
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

  • DMD_TYP_ESM_FLOAT32 32 bits float ESM parameter (WF)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON_FLOAT32 32 bits float ESM monitoring (RF)

sidxthe depth of the register
kindthe kind of value to read

  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value

  • DMD_TYP_PPK_FLOAT32 32 bits float drive parameters (KF)

  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value

  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout

int  typ,
unsigned  idx,
int  sidx,
int  kind,
DSA_DOUBLE_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Get the drive register 64 bits float value - asynchronous.

Parameters
deva pointer to the group structure
typthe type of register
  • DMD_TYP_USER_FLOAT64 64 bits float user registers (XD)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_FLOAT64 64 bits float drive parameters (KD)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR_FLOAT64 64 bits float monitoring registers (MD)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_FLOAT64 64 bits float trace buffer (TD)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_FLOAT64 64 bits float common register (CD)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_FLOAT64 64 bits float ESM parameter (WD)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON_FLOAT64 64 bits float ESM monitoring (RD)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT_FLOAT64 64 bits float movement lookup tables (LD)
idxthe index number of the register
sidxthe depth of the register
kindthe kind of value to read
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value
handlerthe handler function called when the function is executed
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured

int dsa_get_register_int32_a ( DSA_DEVICE *  dev,
int  typ,
unsigned  idx,
int  sidx,
int  kind,
DSA_INT_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Get the drive register 32 bits integer value - asynchronous.

Deprecated:
since EDI-4.24A. Use dsa_get_register_int32_a instead.
Parameters
deva pointer to the group structure
typthe type of register
  • DMD_TYP_USER 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_INT32 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_INT32 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR 32 bits integer monitoring registers (M)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR_INT32 32 bits integer monitoring registers (M)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_INT32 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT_INT32 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_Y 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_Y_INT32 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_INT32 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING_INT32 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM 32 bits integer ESM parameter (W)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_INT32 32 bits integer ESM parameter (W)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON ESM 32 bits integer ESM monitoring (R)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON ESM_INT32 32 bits integer ESM monitoring (R)
idxthe index number of the register
sidxthe depth of the register
kindthe kind of value to read
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value
handlerthe handler function called when the function is executed
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured

DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered

DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group

DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state

int dsa_get_register_int32_s ( DSA_DEVICE *  dev,
int  typ,
unsigned  idx,
int  sidx,
int *  val,
int  kind,
long  timeout 
)

Get the drive register 32 bits integer value - synchronous.

Parameters
deva pointer to the group structure
typthe type of register
  • DMD_TYP_USER 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_INT32 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_INT32 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR 32 bits integer monitoring registers (M)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR_INT32 32 bits integer monitoring registers (M)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_INT32 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT_INT32 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_Y 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_Y_INT32 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_INT32 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING_INT32 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM 32 bits integer ESM parameter (W)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_INT32 32 bits integer ESM parameter (W)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON ESM 32 bits integer ESM monitoring (R)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON ESM_INT32 32 bits integer ESM monitoring (R)
idxthe index number of the register
sidxthe depth of the register
valthe location to return read value
kindthe kind of value to read
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

◆ dsa_get_register_int64_a()

int dsa_get_register_int64_a ( DSA_DEVICE *  dev,
int  typ,
unsigned  idx,
int  sidx,
int  kind,
DSA_INT64_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Get the drive register 64 bits integer value - asynchronous.

Parameters
deva pointer to the group structure
typthe type of register
  • DMD_TYP_USER_INT64 64 bits integer user registers (XL)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_INT64 64 bits integer drive parameters (KL)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR_INT64 64 bits integer monitoring registers (ML)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_INT64 64 bits integer trace buffer (TL)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_INT64 64 bits integer common register (CL)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_INT64 64 bits integer ESM parameter (WL)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON_INT64 64 bits integer ESM monitoring (RL)
idxthe index number of the register
sidxthe depth of the register
kindthe kind of value to read
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value
handlerthe handler function called when the function is executed
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled

DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete

DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error

int dsa_get_register_int64_s ( DSA_DEVICE *  dev,
int  typ,
unsigned  idx,
int  sidx,
eint64 *  val,
int  kind,
long  timeout 
)

Get the drive register 64 bits integer value - synchronous.

Parameters
deva pointer to the group structure
typthe type of register
  • DMD_TYP_USER_INT64 64 bits integer user registers (XL)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_INT64 64 bits integer drive parameters (KL)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR_INT64 64 bits integer monitoring registers (ML)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_INT64 common registers (CL)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_INT64 64 bits integer trace buffer (TL)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_INT64 64 bits integer common register (CL)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_INT64 64 bits integer ESM parameter (WL)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON_INT64 64 bits integer ESM monitoring (RL)
  • DMD_TYP_TRIGGER_INT64 64 bits integer trigger registers (EL)
idxthe index number of the register
sidxthe depth of the register
valthe location to return read value
kindthe kind of value to read
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured

◆ dsa_get_register_s()

int dsa_get_register_s ( DSA_DEVICE *  dev,
int  typ,
unsigned  idx,
int  sidx,
int *  val,
int  kind,
long  timeout 
)

Get the drive register integer 32 bits value - synchronous.

Deprecated:
since EDI-4.24A. Use dsa_get_register_int32_s instead.
Parameters
deva pointer to the group structure
typthe type of register
  • DMD_TYP_USER 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_INT32 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_INT32 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR 32 bits integer monitoring registers (M)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR_INT32 32 bits integer monitoring registers (M)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_INT32 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT_INT32 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_Y 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_Y_INT32 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_INT32 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING_INT32 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM 32 bits integer ESM parameter (W)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_INT32 32 bits integer ESM parameter (W)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON ESM 32 bits integer ESM monitoring (R)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON ESM_INT32 32 bits integer ESM monitoring (R)
idxthe index number of the register
sidxthe depth of the register
valthe location to return read value
kindthe kind of value to read
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured

DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered

◆ dsa_quick_address_request_a()

int dsa_quick_address_request_a ( DSA_DEVICE *  dev,
dword  addr1,
int *  val1,
dword  addr2,
int *  val2,
DSA_2INT_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

special quick drive flash address request - asynchronous

Parameters
deva pointer to the drive structure
addr1the first flash address
val1the location to return read value of the first flash address
addr2the second flash address
val2the location to return read value of the secopnd flash address
handlerthe handler function called when the function is executed
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered

DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group

  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)

◆ dsa_quick_register_float32_request_s()

int dsa_quick_register_float32_request_s ( DSA_DEVICE *  dev,
int  typ1,
unsigned  idx1,
int  sidx1,
float *  val1,
int  typ2,
unsigned  idx2,
int  sidx2,
float *  val2,
dword *  rx_time,
long  timeout 
)

Request 2 float 32 bits increments registers - synchronous.

Parameters
deva pointer to the drive structure
typ1the type of first register
  • DMD_TYP_USER_FLOAT32 32 bits float user registers (XF)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_FLOAT32 32 bits float drive parameters (KF)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR_FLOAT32 32 bits float monitoring registers (MF)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_FLOAT32 32 bits float common register (CF)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_FLOAT32 32 bits float trace buffer (TF)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_FLOAT32 32 bits float ESM parameter (WF)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON_FLOAT32 32 bits float ESM monitoring (RF)
idx1the index number of the first register
sidx1the depth of the first register
val1the location to return read value of the first register
typ2the type of second register
  • DMD_TYP_USER_FLOAT32 32 bits float user registers (XF)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_FLOAT32 32 bits float drive parameters (KF)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR_FLOAT32 32 bits float monitoring registers (MF)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_FLOAT32 32 bits float common register (CF)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_FLOAT32 32 bits float trace buffer (TF)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_FLOAT32 32 bits float ESM parameter (WF)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON_FLOAT32 32 bits float ESM monitoring (RF)
idx2the index number of the second register
sidx2the depth of the second register
val2the location to return read value of the second register
rx_timethe location to return read absolute time
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error

◆ dsa_quick_register_float64_request_s()

int dsa_quick_register_float64_request_s ( DSA_DEVICE *  dev,
int  typ1,
unsigned  idx1,
int  sidx1,
double *  val1,
int  typ2,
unsigned  idx2,
int  sidx2,
double *  val2,
dword *  rx_time,
long  timeout 
)

Request 2 float 64 bits increments registers - synchronous.

Parameters
deva pointer to the drive structure
typ1the type of first register
  • DMD_TYP_USER_FLOAT64 64 bits float user registers (XD)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_FLOAT64 64 bits float drive parameters (KD)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR_FLOAT64 64 bits float monitoring registers (MD)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_FLOAT64 64 bits float common register (CD)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_FLOAT64 64 bits float trace buffer (TD)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT_FLOAT64 64 bits float movement lookup tables (LD)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_FLOAT64 64 bits float ESM parameter (WD)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON_FLOAT64 64 bits float ESM monitoring (RD)
idx1the index number of the first register
sidx1the depth of the first register
val1the location to return read value of the first register
typ2the type of second register
  • DMD_TYP_USER_FLOAT64 64 bits float user registers (XD)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_FLOAT64 64 bits float drive parameters (KD)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR_FLOAT64 64 bits float monitoring registers (MD)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_FLOAT64 64 bits float common register (CD)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_FLOAT64 64 bits float trace buffer (TD)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT_FLOAT64 64 bits float movement lookup tables (LD)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_FLOAT64 64 bits float ESM parameter (WD)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON_FLOAT64 64 bits float ESM monitoring (RD)
idx2the index number of the second register
sidx2the depth of the second register
val2the location to return read value of the second register
rx_timethe location to return read absolute time
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

◆ dsa_quick_register_int32_request_a()

int dsa_quick_register_int32_request_a ( DSA_DEVICE *  dev,
int  typ1,
unsigned  idx1,
int  sidx1,
int *  val1,
int  typ2,
unsigned  idx2,
int  sidx2,
int *  val2,
dword *  rx_time,
DSA_2INT_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Request 2 integer 32 bits increments registers - aasynchronous.

Parameters
deva pointer to the drive structure
typ1the type of first register
  • DMD_TYP_USER 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_INT32 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_INT32 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR 32 bits integer monitoring registers (M)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR_INT32 32 bits integer monitoring registers (M)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_INT32 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_INT32 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING_INT32 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT_INT32 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_Y 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_Y_INT32 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM 32 bits integer ESM parameter (W)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_INT32 32 bits integer ESM parameter (W)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON ESM 32 bits integer ESM monitoring (R)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON ESM_INT32 32 bits integer ESM monitoring (R)
idx1the index number of the first register
sidx1the depth of the first register
val1the location to return read value of the first register
typ2the type of second register
  • DMD_TYP_USER 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_INT32 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_INT32 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR 32 bits integer monitoring registers (M)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR_INT32 32 bits integer monitoring registers (M)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_INT32 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_INT32 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING_INT32 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT_INT32 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_Y 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_Y_INT32 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM 32 bits integer ESM parameter (W)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_INT32 32 bits integer ESM parameter (W)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON ESM 32 bits integer ESM monitoring (R)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON ESM_INT32 32 bits integer ESM monitoring (R)
idx2the index number of the second register
sidx2the depth of the second register
val2the location to return read value of the second register
rx_timethe location to return read absolute time
handlerthe handler function called when the function is executed
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered

DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group

DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state

DSA_ECONVERT conversion error

DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed

DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error

DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available

DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete

DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error

int  typ1,
unsigned  idx1,
int  sidx1,
int *  val1,
int  typ2,
unsigned  idx2,
int  sidx2,
int *  val2,
dword *  rx_time,
long  timeout 
)

Request 2 integer 32 bits increments registers - synchronous.

Parameters
deva pointer to the drive structure
typ1the type of first register
  • DMD_TYP_USER 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_INT32 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_INT32 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR 32 bits integer monitoring registers (M)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR_INT32 32 bits integer monitoring registers (M)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_INT32 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_INT32 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING_INT32 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT_INT32 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_Y 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_Y_INT32 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM 32 bits integer ESM parameter (W)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_INT32 32 bits integer ESM parameter (W)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON ESM 32 bits integer ESM monitoring (R)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON ESM_INT32 32 bits integer ESM monitoring (R)
idx1the index number of the first register
sidx1the depth of the first register
val1the location to return read value of the first register
typ2the type of second register
  • DMD_TYP_USER 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_INT32 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_INT32 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR 32 bits integer monitoring registers (M)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR_INT32 32 bits integer monitoring registers (M)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_INT32 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_INT32 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING_INT32 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT_INT32 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_Y 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_Y_INT32 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM 32 bits integer ESM parameter (W)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_INT32 32 bits integer ESM parameter (W)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON ESM 32 bits integer ESM monitoring (R)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON ESM_INT32 32 bits integer ESM monitoring (R)
idx2the index number of the second register
sidx2the depth of the second register
val2the location to return read value of the second register
rx_timethe location to return read absolute time
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet

int  sidx1,
eint64 *  val1,
int  typ2,
unsigned  idx2,
int  sidx2,
eint64 *  val2,
dword *  rx_time,
long  timeout 
)

Request 2 integer 64 bits increments registers - synchronous.

Parameters
deva pointer to the drive structure
typ1the type of first register
  • DMD_TYP_USER_INT64 64 bits integer user registers (XL)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_INT64 64 bits integer drive parameters (KL)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR_INT64 64 bits integer monitoring registers (ML)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_INT64 64 bits integer common register (CL)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_INT64 64 bits integer trace buffer (TL)
  • DMD_TYP_TRIGGER_INT64 64 bits integer triggers buffer (EL)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_INT64 64 bits integer ESM parameter (WL)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON_INT64 64 bits integer ESM monitoring (RL)
idx1the index number of the first register
sidx1the depth of the first register
val1the location to return read value of the first register
typ2the type of second register
  • DMD_TYP_USER_INT64 64 bits integer user registers (XL)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_INT64 64 bits integer drive parameters (KL)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR_INT64 64 bits integer monitoring registers (ML)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_INT64 64 bits integer common register (CL)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_INT64 64 bits integer trace buffer (TL)
  • DMD_TYP_TRIGGER_INT64 64 bits integer triggers buffer (EL)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_INT64 64 bits integer ESM parameter (WL)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON_INT64 64 bits integer ESM monitoring (RL)
idx2the index number of the second register
sidx2the depth of the second register
val2the location to return read value of the second register
rx_timethe location to return read absolute time
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured

DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet

  • DMD_TYP_USER 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_INT32 32 bits integer user registers (X)

  • DMD_TYP_PPK_INT32 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)

  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_INT32 32 bits integer common register (C)

  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_INT32 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING_INT32 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT_INT32 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_Y 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_Y_INT32 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM 32 bits integer ESM parameter (W)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_INT32 32 bits integer ESM parameter (W)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON ESM 32 bits integer ESM monitoring (R)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_MON ESM_INT32 32 bits integer ESM monitoring (R)
idx2the index number of the second register
sidx2the depth of the second register
val2the location to return read value of the second register
rx_timethe location to return read absolute time
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

PPP

◆ dsa_set_array_a()

int dsa_set_array_a ( DSA_DEVICE_BASE *  grp,
int  typ,
unsigned  idx,
unsigned  nidx,
int  sidx,
int *  val,
int  offset,
DSA_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Set an array of drive register 32 bits integer values - asynchronous.

Deprecated:
since EDI-4.24A. Use dsa_set_array_int32_a instead.
Parameters
grpa pointer to the group structure
typthe type of register
  • DMD_TYP_USER 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_INT32 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_INT32 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR 32 bits integer monitoring registers (M)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR_INT32 32 bits integer monitoring registers (M)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_INT32 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT_INT32 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_Y 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_Y_INT32 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_INT32 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING_INT32 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
idxthe index number of the register
nidxthe size of the array
sidxthe depth of the register
valthe array to write in the the register array
offsetthe difference in bytes between two consecutive array elements
handlerthe handler function called when the function is executed
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered

DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group

DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled

DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed

)

Set an array of drive register 32 bits float values - asynchronous.

Parameters
grpa pointer to the group structure
typthe type of register
  • DMD_TYP_USER_FLOAT32 32 bits float user registers (XF)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_FLOAT32 32 bits float drive parameters (KF)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR_FLOAT32 32 bits float monitoring registers (MF)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_FLOAT32 32 bits float trace buffer (TF)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_FLOAT32 32 bits float common register (CF)
idxthe index number of the register
nidxthe size of the array
sidxthe depth of the register
valthe array to write in the the register array
offsetthe difference in bytes between two consecutive array elements
handlerthe handler function called when the function is executed
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured

  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_FLOAT64 64 bits float common register (CD)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT_FLOAT64 64 bits float movement lookup tables (LD)

nidxthe size of the array
sidxthe depth of the register

DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

◆ dsa_set_array_int64_a()

int dsa_set_array_int64_a ( DSA_DEVICE_BASE *  grp,
int  typ,
unsigned  idx,
unsigned  nidx,
int  sidx,
eint64 *  val,
int  offset,
DSA_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Set an array of drive register 64 bits integer values - asynchronous.

Parameters
grpa pointer to the group structure
typthe type of register
  • DMD_TYP_USER_INT64 64 bits integer user registers (XL)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_INT64 64 bits integer drive parameters (KL)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR_INT64 64 bits integer monitoring registers (ML)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_INT64 64 bits integer trace buffer (TL)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_INT64 64 bits integer common register (CL)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_INT64 64 bits integer ESM parameter (WL)
  • DMD_TYP_TRIGGER_INT64 64 bits integer Trigger (EL)
idxthe index number of the register
nidxthe size of the array
sidxthe depth of the register
valthe array to write in the the register array
offsetthe difference in bytes between two consecutive array elements
handlerthe handler function called when the function is executed
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device

DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error

DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response

int  typ,
unsigned  idx,
unsigned  nidx,
int  sidx,
eint64 *  val,
int  offset,
long  timeout 
)

Set an array of drive register 64 bits integer values - synchronous.

Parameters
grpa pointer to the group structure
typthe type of register
  • DMD_TYP_USER_INT64 64 bits integer user registers (XL)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_INT64 64 bits integer drive parameters (KL)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_INT64 64 bits integer trace buffer (TL)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_INT64 64 bits integer common register (CL)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_INT64 64 bits integer ESM parameter (WL)
  • DMD_TYP_TRIGGER_INT64 64 bits integer Trigger (EL)
idxthe index number of the register
nidxthe size of the array
sidxthe depth of the register
valthe array to write in the the register array
offsetthe difference in bytes between two consecutive array elements
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet

◆ dsa_set_array_s()

int dsa_set_array_s ( DSA_DEVICE_BASE *  grp,
int  typ,
unsigned  idx,
unsigned  nidx,
int  sidx,
int *  val,
int  offset,
long  timeout 
)

Set an array of drive register 32 bits integer values - synchronous.

Deprecated:
since EDI-4.24A. Use dsa_set_array_int32_s instead.
Parameters
grpa pointer to the group structure
typthe type of register
  • DMD_TYP_USER 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_INT32 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_INT32 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR 32 bits integer monitoring registers (M)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR_INT32 32 bits integer monitoring registers (M)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_INT32 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT_INT32 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_Y 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_Y_INT32 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_INT32 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING_INT32 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM 32 bits integer ESM parameter (W)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_INT32 32 bits integer ESM parameter (W)
idxthe index number of the register
nidxthe size of the array
sidxthe depth of the register
valthe array to write in the the register array
offsetthe difference in bytes between two consecutive array elements
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered

DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found

DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state

◆ dsa_set_iso_array_a()

int dsa_set_iso_array_a ( DSA_DEVICE_BASE *  grp,
int  typ,
unsigned  idx,
unsigned  nidx,
int  sidx,
double *  val,
int  offset,
int  conv,
DSA_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Set the drive register values in iso unit if possible - asynchronous.

Parameters
grpa pointer to the group structure
typthe type of register
  • DMD_TYP_USER 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_INT32 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_INT64 64 bits integer user registers (XL)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_FLOAT32 32 bits float user registers (XF)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_FLOAT64 64 bits float user registers (XD)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_INT32 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_INT64 64 bits integer drive parameters (KL)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_FLOAT32 32 bits float drive parameters (KF)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_FLOAT64 64 bits float drive parameters (KD)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_INT32 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_INT64 64 bits integer trace buffer (TL)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_FLOAT32 32 bits float trace buffer (TF)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_FLOAT64 64 bits float trace buffer (TD)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT_INT32 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT_FLOAT64 64 bits float movement lookup tables (LD)
  • DMD_TYP_TRIGGER_INT64 64 bits integer triggers buffer (EL)
  • DMD_TYP_Y 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_Y_INT32 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_INT32 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_INT64 64 bits integer common register (CL)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_FLOAT32 32 bits float common register (CF)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_FLOAT64 64 bits float common register (CD)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING_INT32 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
idxthe index number of the register
nidxthe size of the array
sidxthe depth of the register
valthe address of the array to write in the the register array
offsetthe difference in bytes between two consecutive array elements
convthe conversion function index for the array
  • The conversion function number or
  • DSA_CONV_AUTO will use conversion function associated to the register passsed as parameter
  • DSA_PPK_CONV(<register index>, <register subindex>) will use conversion function associated to the specified K register
  • DSA_MON_CONV(<register index>, <register subindex>) will use conversion function associated to the specified M register
  • DSA_REG_CONV(<register typ>, <register index>, <register subindex>) will use conversion function associated to the specified register
handlerthe handler function called when the function is executed
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

int dsa_set_iso_array_s ( DSA_DEVICE_BASE *  grp,
int  typ,
unsigned  idx,
unsigned  nidx,
int  sidx,
double *  val,
int  offset,
int  conv,
long  timeout 
)

Set the drive register values in iso unit if possible - synchronous.

Parameters
grpa pointer to the group structure
typthe type of register
  • DMD_TYP_USER 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_INT32 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_INT64 64 bits integer user registers (XL)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_FLOAT32 32 bits float user registers (XF)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_FLOAT64 64 bits float user registers (XD)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_INT32 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_INT64 64 bits integer drive parameters (KL)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_FLOAT32 32 bits float drive parameters (KF)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_FLOAT64 64 bits float drive parameters (KD)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_INT32 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_INT64 64 bits integer trace buffer (TL)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_FLOAT32 32 bits float trace buffer (TF)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_FLOAT64 64 bits float trace buffer (TD)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT_INT32 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT_FLOAT64 64 bits float movement lookup tables (LD)
  • DMD_TYP_TRIGGER_INT64 64 bits integer triggers buffer (EL)
  • DMD_TYP_Y 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_Y_INT32 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_INT32 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_INT64 64 bits integer common register (CL)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_FLOAT32 32 bits float common register (CF)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_FLOAT64 64 bits float common register (CD)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING_INT32 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
idxthe index number of the register
nidxthe size of the array
sidxthe depth of the register
valthe address of the array to write in the the register array
offsetthe difference in bytes between two consecutive array elements
convthe conversion function index for the array
  • The conversion function number or
  • DSA_CONV_AUTO will use conversion function associated to the register passsed as parameter
  • DSA_PPK_CONV(<register index>, <register subindex>) will use conversion function associated to the specified K register
  • DSA_MON_CONV(<register index>, <register subindex>) will use conversion function associated to the specified M register
  • DSA_REG_CONV(<register typ>, <register index>, <register subindex>) will use conversion function associated to the specified register
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered

DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group

DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error

DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original

◆ dsa_set_iso_register_a()

int dsa_set_iso_register_a ( DSA_DEVICE_BASE *  grp,
int  typ,
unsigned  idx,
int  sidx,
double  val,
int  conv,
DSA_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Set the drive register value in iso unit if possible (Command:XYY_ABS) - asynchronous.

!!! If setting a system register, the user should call dsa_reset, allowing EDI to recompute ISO conversion factors !!!
!!! See EDI documentation to check which registers are "system" registers

Parameters
grpa pointer to the group structure
typthe type of register
  • DMD_TYP_USER 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_INT32 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_INT64 64 bits integer user registers (XL)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_FLOAT32 32 bits float user registers (XF)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_FLOAT64 64 bits float user registers (XD)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_INT32 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_INT64 64 bits integer drive parameters (KL)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_FLOAT32 32 bits float drive parameters (KF)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_FLOAT64 64 bits float drive parameters (KD)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_INT32 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_INT64 64 bits integer trace buffer (TL)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_FLOAT32 32 bits float trace buffer (TF)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_FLOAT64 64 bits float trace buffer (TD)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT_INT32 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT_FLOAT64 64 bits float movement lookup tables (LD)
  • DMD_TYP_TRIGGER_INT64 64 bits integer triggers buffer (EL)
  • DMD_TYP_Y 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_Y_INT32 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_INT32 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_INT64 64 bits integer common register (CL)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_FLOAT32 32 bits float common register (CF)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_FLOAT64 64 bits float common register (CD)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING_INT32 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
idxthe index number of the register
sidxthe depth of the register
valthe value to write in the the register
convthe conversion function index for the register
  • The conversion function number or
  • DSA_CONV_AUTO will use conversion function associated to the register passsed as parameter
  • DSA_PPK_CONV(<register index>, <register subindex>) will use conversion function associated to the specified K register
  • DSA_MON_CONV(<register index>, <register subindex>) will use conversion function associated to the specified M register
  • DSA_REG_CONV(<register typ>, <register index>, <register subindex>) will use conversion function associated to the specified register
handlerthe handler function called when the function is executed
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

◆ dsa_set_iso_register_s()

int dsa_set_iso_register_s ( DSA_DEVICE_BASE *  grp,
int  typ,
unsigned  idx,
int  sidx,
double  val,
int  conv,
long  timeout 
)

Set the drive register value in iso unit if possible (Command:XYY_ABS) - synchronous.

!!! If setting a system register, the user should call dsa_reset, allowing EDI to recompute ISO conversion factors !!!
!!! See EDI documentation to check which registers are "system" registers

Parameters
grpa pointer to the group structure
typthe type of register
  • DMD_TYP_USER 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_INT32 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_INT64 64 bits integer user registers (XL)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_FLOAT32 32 bits float user registers (XF)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_FLOAT64 64 bits float user registers (XD)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_INT32 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_INT64 64 bits integer drive parameters (KL)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_FLOAT32 32 bits float drive parameters (KF)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_FLOAT64 64 bits float drive parameters (KD)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_INT32 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_INT64 64 bits integer trace buffer (TL)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_FLOAT32 32 bits float trace buffer (TF)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_FLOAT64 64 bits float trace buffer (TD)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT_INT32 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT_FLOAT64 64 bits float movement lookup tables (LD)
  • DMD_TYP_TRIGGER_INT64 64 bits integer triggers buffer (EL)
  • DMD_TYP_Y 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_Y_INT32 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_INT32 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_INT64 64 bits integer common register (CL)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_FLOAT32 32 bits float common register (CF)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_FLOAT64 64 bits float common register (CD)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING_INT32 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
idxthe index number of the register
sidxthe depth of the register
valthe value to write in the the register
convthe conversion function index for the register
  • The conversion function number or
  • DSA_CONV_AUTO will use conversion function associated to the register passsed as parameter
  • DSA_PPK_CONV(<register index>, <register subindex>) will use conversion function associated to the specified K register
  • DSA_MON_CONV(<register index>, <register subindex>) will use conversion function associated to the specified M register
  • DSA_REG_CONV(<register typ>, <register index>, <register subindex>) will use conversion function associated to the specified register
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

◆ dsa_set_register_a()

int dsa_set_register_a ( DSA_DEVICE_BASE *  grp,
int  typ,
unsigned  idx,
int  sidx,
int  val,
DSA_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Set the drive register 32 bits integer value (Command:XYY_ABS) - asynchronous.

!!! If setting a system register, the user should call dsa_reset, allowing EDI to recompute ISO conversion factors !!!
!!! See EDI documentation to check which registers are "system" registers

Parameters
grpa pointer to the group structure
typthe type of register
  • DMD_TYP_USER 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_INT32 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_INT32 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_INT32 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT_INT32 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_Y 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_Y_INT32 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_INT32 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING_INT32 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM 32 bits integer ESM parameter (W)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_INT32 32 bits integer ESM parameter (W)
idxthe index number of the register
sidxthe depth of the register
valthe value to write in the the register
handlerthe handler function called when the function is executed
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured

DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet

  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_FLOAT64 64 bits float trace buffer (TD)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_FLOAT64 64 bits float common register (CD)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_FLOAT64 64 bits float ESM parameter (WD)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT_FLOAT64 64 bits float movement lookup tables (LD)

sidxthe depth of the register

handlerthe handler function called when the function is executed

a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured

int  typ,

int  sidx,

long  timeout 
)

Set the drive register 32 bits integer value (Command:XYY_ABS) - synchronous.

!!! If setting a system register, the user should call dsa_reset, allowing EDI to recompute ISO conversion factors !!!
!!! See EDI documentation to check which registers are "system" registers

Parameters
grpa pointer to the group structure
typthe type of register
  • DMD_TYP_USER 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_INT32 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_INT32 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_INT32 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_LKT_INT32 32 bits integer movement lookup tables (L)
  • DMD_TYP_Y 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_Y_INT32 32 bits integer Y type variables (Y)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_INT32 32 bits integer common register (C)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
  • DMD_TYP_MAPPING_INT32 32 bits integer mapping registers (P)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM 32 bits integer ESM parameter (W)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_INT32 32 bits integer ESM parameter (W)
idxthe index number of the register
sidxthe depth of the register
valthe value to write in the the register
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

◆ dsa_set_register_int64_a()

int dsa_set_register_int64_a ( DSA_DEVICE_BASE *  grp,
int  typ,
unsigned  idx,
int  sidx,
eint64  val,
DSA_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Set the drive register 64 bits integer value (Command:XYY_ABS) - asynchronous.

!!! If setting a system register, the user should call dsa_reset, allowing EDI to recompute ISO conversion factors !!!
!!! See EDI documentation to check which registers are "system" registers

Parameters
grpa pointer to the group structure
typthe type of register
  • DMD_TYP_USER_INT64 64 bits integer user registers (XL)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_INT64 64 bits integer drive parameters (KL)
  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_INT64 64 bits integer trace buffer (TL)
  • DMD_TYP_COMMON_INT64 64 bits integer common register (CL)
  • DMD_TYP_ESM_INT64 64 bits integer ESM parameter (WL)
  • DMD_TYP_TRIGGER_INT64 64 bits integer Trigger (EL)
idxthe index number of the register
sidxthe depth of the register
valthe value to write in the the register
handlerthe handler function called when the function is executed
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered

unsigned  idx,
int  sidx,
int  val,
long  timeout 
)

Set the drive register 32 bits integer value (Command:XYY_ABS) - synchronous.

!!! If setting a system register, the user should call dsa_reset, allowing EDI to recompute ISO conversion factors !!!
!!! See EDI documentation to check which registers are "system" registers

Parameters
grpa pointer to the group structure
typthe type of register
  • DMD_TYP_USER 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_INT32 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)
  • DMD_TYP_PPK_INT32 32 bits integer drive parameters (K)

  • DMD_TYP_TRACE_INT32 32 bits integer trace buffer (T)

  • DMD_TYP_ESM_INT32 32 bits integer ESM parameter (W)

sidxthe depth of the register
valthe value to write in the the register
